A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Worst star wars movie of all time. If you are a Star Wars fan\, do not put yourself through this. If you a fan of films in general\, you still will probably not enjoy this. Plot holes galore. Over half an hour dedicated to a stupid side plot that has no effect at all on the film and only serves to shove politics down your throat. Established characters acting totally out of character with no explanations. Horribly written new characters. A total disregard for certain things that were set up in the previous film.
